src:
Impresif di Chelsea, Jorginho Dinilai Sudah Sehebat Luka Modric
04 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang Chelsea, Jorginho, dianggap punya potensi menyamai Luka Modric pada level terbaiknya. Sejak awal musim, Jorginho menyuguhkan level permainan impresif yang jelas menguntungkan Frank Lampard.
Teranyar, pemain yang pernah jadi anak emas Maurizio Sarri ini menciptakan assist impresif untuk gol Tammy Abraham kala Chelsea mengalahkan Watford 2-1 akhir pekan lalu. Permainan Jorginho di lini tengah benar-benar penting.
Perjalanannya sebagai pemain The Blues pun layak diceritakan. Jorginho sempat kesulitan pada awal-awal kariernya di Stamford Bridge, tapi dia terus berjuang membuktikan diri di bawah Lampard.
Perkembangan impresif Jorginho ini tak luput dari perhatian analis Premier League, Jamie Redknapp. Dia merasa Jorginho yang sekarang bisa menyamai level Luka Modric.

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Impressive at Chelsea, Jorginho is considered to be as good as Luka Modric
Nov 04 2019, 2:00 PM by Bola.net
Chelsea - Chelsea midfielder Jorginho is considered to have the potential to equal Luka Modric at his best level. Since the start of the season, Jorginho has provided an impressive level of play that clearly benefits Frank Lampard.
Latest, the player who was once a golden boy Maurizio Sarri created an impressive assist for Tammy Abraham's goal when Chelsea beat Watford 2-1 last weekend. Jorginho's game in midfield is really important.
His journey as a Blues player is also worth telling. Jorginho had difficulties at the beginning of his career at Stamford Bridge, but he continued to struggle to prove himself under Lampard.
Jorginho's impressive development has not escaped the attention of Premier League analyst Jamie Redknapp. He felt that Jorginho could now match Luka Modric's level.
